subject: Coaches and Managers
Hiring and Promotion
Football
lead_paragraph: Brad Childress, who spent five seasons with the Vikings before he was fired after 10 games in 2010, will join Pat Shurmur’s staff for the Cleveland Browns.
snippet: Brad Childress, who spent five seasons with the Vikings before he was fired after 10 games in 2010, will join Pat Shurmur’s staff for the Cleveland Browns.
